descriptions.description: Create a simplistic and clutter-free home screen and lock screen experience on iOS 13.
- Home screen: transparent dock, page indicator, hide or rename icon labels
- Lock screen: remove Face ID lock icon, control center grabber, quick action buttons, 'no older notification' prompt, customize unlock hint
- Status bar: rename carrier, hide carrier, hide all status bar items
- Spotlight search: disable search bar in home screen and/or lock screen's today view
Experimental feature: mini media control on lock screen (tested on iPhone X only; may lead to undesirable layout on other phone resolutions)

change.changeDescription: New options for status bar and spotlight search
Unlock hint customization applies to both 'Swipe up to open' (iPhone X+) and 'Press home button to unlock' (Home button devices)
